page.title: 18HAVING FUN IN STRATHNAIRN
page.content: {RUNNING I often go running and I like it as long as I don't get stitches and feel very sore. A special kind of gentle running is called jogging and I like jogging I once jogged one mile and a half and when I come home I was very tired. {HILL WALKING Hill walking is my hobby and it is very good fun. I go up to the top of a very steep hills and I am tired by the time I go to the top and come back down again to my house. It is worth it all when you get to the top and can see the scenery for miles around.On certain hills when it is sunny and clear you can see Inverness. You must always wear suitable clothes and shoes,take a map and tell someone where you are going.
